## Table of Contents

### Classes

#### Public Classes

* [`tang`](#tang): Tang is a server for binding data to network presence

#### Private Classes

* `tang::dropin`: class tang::dropin used by tang main class only.
* `tang::install`: class tang::install used by tang main class only.
* `tang::service`: tang::service class used by tang main class only.

## Classes

### <a name="tang"></a>`tang`

This module installs the tang server which will be used by clevis.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include tang
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `tang` class:

* [`package_name`](#-tang--package_name)
* [`service_name`](#-tang--service_name)

##### <a name="-tang--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `Array[String[1]]`

The name of the tang package

Default value: `['tang']`

##### <a name="-tang--service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String[1]`

Name of the tang service

Default value: `'tangd.socket'`
